docs.snippet: GIOVANNI GABRIELI was one of the dominant figures of church music at the end of the sixteenth and the beginning of the seventeenth century. One rarely encounters his music in concert halls or on the radio, and the release of an album with striking...
docs.lead_paragraph: GIOVANNI GABRIELI was one of the dominant figures of church music at the end of the sixteenth and the beginning of the seventeenth century. One rarely encounters his music in concert halls or on the radio, and the release of an album with striking examples is a valuable contribution.

docs.snippet: Forthcoming holiday events were suggested as Arnold Constable's models moved in rapid succession through the Sert Room of the Waldorf-Astoria yesterday noon. Included were not only warm country togs and smart opera styles but also prophetic notes for...
docs.lead_paragraph: Forthcoming holiday events were suggested as Arnold Constable's models moved in rapid succession through the Sert Room of the Waldorf-Astoria yesterday noon. Included were not only warm country togs and smart opera styles but also prophetic notes for the new year.

headline.main: FASHION SHOWING KEYED TO HOLIDAYS; Country Togs, Opera Styles Presented in Sert Room by Arnold Constable

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 20 -- Reliable private advices from Asuncion, Paraguay, revealed today that the recently signed agreements between Paraguay and Bolivia included a secret military treaty for mutual defense and common action in the event of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 20 -- Reliable private advices from Asuncion, Paraguay, revealed today that the recently signed agreements between Paraguay and Bolivia included a secret military treaty for mutual defense and common action in the event of hostilities between Argentina and Brazil.

headline.main: MILITARY PACT CITED; Secret Treaty of Bolivia and Paraguay Reported

docs.lead_paragraph: I{The Canadian free dollar registered a sharp drop in value last week, getting down to a low of 89 cents, on Saturday, from a price on Monday of 89.87 cents. The close at the week-end was 89.12 cents, a loss of cent from the preceding week, and ]owest in the ]ast month.

docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J., Nov. 25 -- The delegates to the first Council session of the United Nations Relief and Rehabilitation Administration today voted down, 24 to 16, a proposal to qualify a report recently adopted by the "scope" subcommittee to force...
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J., Nov. 25 -- The delegates to the first Council session of the United Nations Relief and Rehabilitation Administration today voted down, 24 to 16, a proposal to qualify a report recently adopted by the "scope" subcommittee to force enemy or ex-enemy countries to pay all the expenses connected with any UNRRA operations in their territories.
